statements: SELECT * FROM product_demand WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM product_demand WHERE demand_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, demand_quantity FROM product_demand WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM product_demand WHERE demand_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT product_name, product_id, demand_date FROM product_demand WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM product_demand WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM product_demand WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_demand WHERE demand_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY demand_date ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM product_demand WHERE demand_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_demands FROM product_demand GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_demands > 3 ORDER BY total_demands DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products
SELECT product_name, demand FROM Products
SELECT product_id, product_name, demand FROM Products WHERE demand > 100
SELECT * FROM AverageDemand WHERE average_demand < 50
SELECT product_id, time_period FROM Products ORDER BY time_period ASC
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE demand > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, average_demand FROM Products INNER JOIN AverageDemand ON Products.product_id = AverageDemand.product_id WHERE time_period = '2022-10-01';
SELECT product_name, AVG(average_demand) AS avg_demand FROM Products INNER JOIN AverageDemand ON Products.product_id = AverageDemand.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY avg_demand DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand, time_period FROM Products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND demand BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_id FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM products LEFT JOIN demand ON products.product_id = demand.product_id;
SELECT MAX(average_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM average_demand;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(demand_id) AS total_demand FROM demand GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_demand > 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT demand_id, demand_quantity FROM demand WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY demand_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(average_quantity) AS average_demand FROM average_demand GROUP BY product_id HAVING average_demand > 50 ORDER BY average_demand DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, d.demand_quantity, a.average_quantity FROM products p JOIN demand d ON p.product_id = d.product_id JOIN average_demand a ON p.product_id = a.product_id WHERE d.demand_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, demand FROM products WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT product_name, total_price FROM sales WHERE total_price < 500 ORDER BY total_price;

SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT product_id, month_year, average_demand FROM demand_statistics WHERE average_demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY month_year DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand FROM products WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, quantity, total_price FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT category_name, product_name, total_price FROM categories c JOIN products p ON c.category_id = p.product_id JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, month_year, average_demand FROM products p JOIN demand_statistics ds ON p.product_id = ds.product_id WHERE average_demand >= 500 ORDER BY month_year ASC;
